nodes.text: Star Wars Resistance: Meet the Pilots

Star Wars Resistance: Meet the Pilots is a young reader's World of Reading book Level 2 from the Star Wars Resistance series that focuses on Kazuda Xiono and other pilots from the series. The book was released on January 8, 2019. It is an adaptation of the episode "The Recruit" written by Ella Patrick.

Meet the pilots and characters from Star Wars Resistance, an exciting new animated adventure series set before the events of The Force Awakens about Kazuda Xiono, a young pilot recruited by the Resistance and tasked with a top-secret mission to spy on the growing threat of the First Order (airing Fall 2018 on Disney Channel).
